thread.title: New Moerlein brew will use rare, local hops
thread.title_full: New Moerlein brew will use rare, local hops

title: New Moerlein brew will use rare, local hops
text:
Published By: Cincinnati Enquirer: Business - Today 
Christian Moerlein Brewing Co. is gearing up to release a new beer made with both fresh Ohio-grown hops and a rare hop from the U.K....
